title: Cherry, sweet potato and wensleydale salad

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Toss the sweet potato with 1 tbsp olive oil on a large baking sheet. Season and roast for 30 minutes, until golden; set aside.

Combine the mustard and vinegar. Season, then whisk in the remaining 3 tbsp oil and 1 tbsp water. Stir in any juice from the cherries, then toss with the tarragon, spinach and sweet potato. Divide between plates and scatter with the cherries and sliced wensleydale.
